summary: An old sow sends her three pigs out to seek their fortunes. The first pig builds a straw house but is eaten by a wolf after he blows it down. The second pig builds a furze house with a similar fate. The third pig builds a brick house, which the wolf can’t blow down. The pig repeatedly outsmarts the wolf's attempts to catch him and eventually kills the wolf by tricking him into falling into a pot of boiling water, ensuring the pig's survival and happiness.

nodes.label: Old Sow
nodes.title: The mother of the three little pigs, she sent them out to seek their fortune due to lack of resources

nodes.label: First Little Pig
nodes.title: The pig that built a house of straw and was eaten by the Wolf

nodes.label: Man with straw
nodes.title: Gave the first little pig straw to build a house

nodes.label: Wolf
nodes.title: The main antagonist who blew down the houses of straw and furze and ate the first two pigs, failed to destroy the brick house, and was ultimately outsmarted and cooked by the third pig

nodes.label: Second Little Pig
nodes.title: The pig that built a house of furze and was eaten by the Wolf

nodes.label: Man with furze
nodes.title: Gave the second little pig furze to build a house

nodes.label: Third Little Pig
nodes.title: The clever pig that built a brick house, outsmarted the Wolf multiple times, and eventually killed and ate the Wolf

nodes.label: Man with bricks
nodes.title: Gave the third little pig bricks to build a sturdy house

edges.label: bore and sent out
edges.title: Once upon a time there was an old Sow with three little Pigs; As she had not enough to keep them, she sent them out to seek their fortune.

edges.label: bore and sent out
edges.title: Once upon a time there was an old Sow with three little Pigs; As she had not enough to keep them, she sent them out to seek their fortune.

edges.label: bore and sent out
edges.title: Once upon a time there was an old Sow with three little Pigs; As she had not enough to keep them, she sent them out to seek their fortune.

edges.label: requested and received straw
edges.title: The first that went off met a Man with a bundle of straw, and said to him, "Please, Man, give me that straw to build me a house"; which the Man did.

edges.label: knocked
edges.title: denied entry, and ate, Presently came along a Wolf, and knocked at the door, and said, "Little Pig, little Pig, let me come in." To which the Pig answered, "No, no, by the hair of my chinny chin chin." So he huffed and he puffed, and he blew his house in, and ate up the little Pig.

edges.label: requested and received furze
edges.title: The second Pig met a Man with a bundle of furze, and said, "Please, Man, give me that furze to build a house"; which the Man did.

edges.label: knocked
edges.title: denied entry, and ate, Then along came the Wolf and said, "Little Pig, little Pig, let me come in." "No, no, by the hair of my chinny chin chin." And at last he blew the house down, and ate up the second little Pig.

edges.label: requested and received bricks
edges.title: The third little Pig met a Man with a load of bricks, and said, "Please, Man, give me those bricks to build a house with"; so the Man gave him the bricks.
